game.name: Magical Girl Opal
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hikari Saitou was just a normal student,until one day, she was transformed into Magical Girl Opal! As a magical girl, it is her duty to fight the evil organization called Cynthia, and to protect Earth from being conquered.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hikari Saitou was just a normal student,until one day, she was transformed into Magical Girl Opal! As a magical girl, it is her duty to fight the evil organization called Cynthia, and to protect Earth from being conquered.
